description: "Our research is nearly complete! Now we just need you to use the Uplink facilities on Crescent Falls; we should be able to use recent surface scans of the area to locate Letium vents."

title: Shopping List
description: "Our researchers on the station have been analyzing the data you retrieved, and have requested a few items to speed things up. I suggest checking old Osiris labs, I'm sure they won't mind."

title: Exotic Leathers
description: "Excellent... now we just need enough raw materials for a sample run. Getting these shouldn't be an issue for you, right?"

title: Lost Knowledge Part 2
description: "We've received several reports of faulty weapons: jams, low power, misaligned sights... I need you to get me data on our weapons' performance against real targets. The old Favela in Crescent Falls should be a good test site."

title: Never Give Up Part 2
description: "This whole ordeal has sapped too many of our funds and resources, we need to get back in people's minds, and their cash in our pockets. I want you to head to the old Geothermal Plant and remind anyone in the area that ICA sells the best weaponry. And bring back some loot while you're in the area, for the sake of appearances."

title: The Missing Engineer
description: "Prospector! We believe we've located where our Letium-covered friend was working, and our records show that at the time he was with one of our best mudloggers. Head out and find their remains, there might be something to this!"

title: Clear Focus
description: "We have a new Scanner mod in the works, one that can find Focus Crystals. We'll need some high purity samples for callibration."

title: Animal Control
description: "Critters at the Lagoon on Bright Sands have been getting in the way of our Salvage Troops. Killing a few should scare them off for a while."

title: Field Research Part 7
description: "You're really adept at shooting things, aren't you? Unfortunately, so are rattlers. Head to the Bright Sands Jungle and get me some rattler eyes, I want to know how they spot and track targets."

title: Final Touches
description: "Good news bad news situation. Our prototype works, but it needs much stronger materials. Get us these, Prospector."

title: Contaminated Waters
description: "We plan to send a team down to the old Bright Sands Water Facility to salvage some special parts, but too many creatures nest there now. Go clear it the area out, OK?"

title: Project Fireball Part 5
description: "One of the supply crates for our project was left open under the rain, damaged most of the contents and now my team needs replacement parts. Stash them somewhere safe, we need to finish that prototype."

title: Working for the Community Part 2
description: "Another prospector took a bad beating in Crescent Falls; foam kit failed to deploy fully and left his arm exposed. Not much left of it when the retrieval bot got to him, and he wants revenge. I hope you can satisfy his request?"

title: Time for More Work? Part 2
description: "A group of delegates from a trading partner will be visiting us soon, and they always expect gifts. See if you can find something shiny for them."

title: Tick-Tock
description: "Brightcaps are a marvel, one of only a handful of organisms originating from Earth to mutate into something new. Get me fresh samples, and get rid of the Blast Ticks that feast on them while you're at it."

title: Audiophiles Beware Part 1
description: "Good to see you again! As you know the ICA likes to tinker and create its own tools, and I think prospectors like you will like what we're fixing up now! But first, you'll need to stash a few grenades for us, over in the Swamp."

title: Stimulating Developments Part 1
description: "This should interest you: we have a small team researching new, stronger health stims, but we're low on certain materials that were never restocked on station. Head to the Vaccine Labs and bring back some Medical Supplies."

title: Project Fireball Part 1
description: "Our people have gone through more of the data Tao recovered, and this might just make sense. We'll need some mag stabs to start our tests, and more importantly, Meteor Fragments."

title: Never Give Up Part 3
description: "Another location mentioned is around the Skeleton Research area; head there and clear it out. Hrmm, the wrong people might start getting curious about what we're up to... bring back some Rattler Skins and salvaged equipment; you know, normal prospector work."

title: An Eye for Oil Part 2
description: "Excellent, but you're not done yet. These are the last components we need, I promise."

title: Breaking and Entering Part 1
description: "It's time! Head to the Crystal Caverns' entrance and place the Orbital Cannon Beacon; once its finally served its purpose, search the caverns and retrieve whatever you find. We might finally have found a path to the internals of the planet's terraformers!"

title: Miners' Strike
description:
"Ah, just the prospector I needed! We need you to go back to the Dig Site, it seems there are some... matters that need to be handled before those journalists arrive for their tour.
Some of the site's workers refused to follow evacuation procedures and the creatures got to them before our rescue teams; we'd like you to retrieve their cameras, to protect their dignity.""

title: Working for the Community Part 3
description: "Fruit from Fortuna III fetches a nice price in the Artery systems, rare delicacy from a deadly world and all that. Growing it on the station would be a lot easier, don't you think?"

title: The Stranded Prospector
description: "We found a number of candidate locations Tao could have visited, but there's one only a skilled prospector can access. Head there, and check the nearby Uplink; if I kno- knew, Tao, he'll have saved something for us to find."

title: A new type of Alloy
description: Our scientists are confident they can create a new, extremely durable alloy from Hardened Bone Plates and Compound Sheets! Bring us what we need.

title: Station Defense
description: The targeting systems of our station defense systems have been damaged by Storm radiation. Bring us Autoloaders and Optic Glass for the repairs.

title: Old Currency
description: We have received reports of Old Currency being found on Fortuna. That stuff is pretty valuable. Bring us some!

title: Explosive Excavation
description: One of our mines collapsed with valuable equipment inside. Bring us Derelict Explosives so we can blast it free!

title: Recoil Compensation
description: Upgrades to our rifles are long overdue. To go into production with improved Recoil Compensators, we need Shock Absorbers and Compound Sheets.

title: A new Energy Source?
description: We've found a way to gain energy from Charged Spinal Bases from creatures affected by the Storm. We need some... and some Gyroscopes while you're down there.

title: Veltecite Hearts
description: Bring us some Veltecite Hearts, the highest purity of Veltecite, for us to experiment on.

title: Espionnage II
description: Osiris is gaining an incredible amount of energy from Charged Spinal Bases. Go kill creatures to cut off their supply and get us some samples.

title: Cretins
description: Don't ask me how, but those Korolev numbskulls managed to extract powerful toxins from Toxic Glands. We need some samples, Prospector!

title: Clear Veltecite
description: The Veltecite you brought us the other day is already spent. We need more energy! Get us some Clear Veltecite this time!

title: Surveillance Center
description: We want to expand our surveillance operations here on Prospect Station. Bring us Interactive Screens and Magnetic Field Stabilizers.

title: Gun Manufacturing
description: Our material scientists found a way to use Copper Wires and Spinal Bases in the manufacturing process of energy rifles. Bring us some!

title: Air Lock Upgrades
description: Our engineers designed a safer airlock system that should reduce fatalities. We need Hardened Metals, Alloys and Polymetallic Prefabricate.

title: Time to Focus
description: One of our miners searching the Jungle for Focus Crystals was wounded by creatures. Go clear the area, and bring back Focus Crystals they should have.

title: Data Center Upgrades
description: Turns out our data center was not powerful enough for the calculations needed for our energy experiment. Bring us Master Unit CPUs!

title: Keep the Experiment running
description: Good news, Prospector! The experiment seems to be a success! Bring us more Charged Spinal Bases to keep it running!

title: Industry Secret
description: Hm. Interesting. The Pure Focus Crystals you brought us worked perfectly for the new lenses. Bring us more! I can already taste Osiris' envy.

title: Rattle the Cage
description: Those damned Rattlers keep interfering with mining operations! Hunt some of them down, and use a Shotgun, make it brutal.

title: Eliminate the Threat
description: One of our excavators was just ripped to shreds by ferocious creatures, the kind known as "Marauders". I don't care how you do it, but hunt them down!

title: Secure the LZ
description: Prospector. Creatures are hindering our Research Teams from landing at Base Camp. You know what to do.

title: Pure Veltecite
description: The Clear Veltecite was an improvement, we gained much more energy from it, but we need more! See if you can get your hands on some Pure Veltecite.

title: For Science
description: Ah, Prospector. Our Science Campus has been overrun by creatures! Go kill them to protect our delicate research equipment.

title: Sensor Array Repairs
description: A Marauder damaged one of our sensor arrays. Bring us Interactive Screens, Optic Glass and Polymetallic Prefabricate so we can fix it.

title: Xeno-Archaeology I
description: You know that big Skeleton on Crescent Falls? We want to send an Archaeologist to take a look at it, but it's crawling with Striders. Eliminate them.

title: Secure the Perimeter
description: The Science Campus and the Vaccine Labs, two very valuable Osiris sites, are teeming with creatures! You know what to do, Prospector.

title: Classified I
description: Prospector! We need Derelict Explosives, Master Unit CPUs and Compound Sheets. Dont ask questions, just go acquire the materials.

title: Clearing the Dig Site
description: The Dig Site, one of our most valuable excavations, has been overrun by creatures! You know what to do, now go!

title: Debugging
description: Rattlers are messing with what's left of the the old Bright Sands Comms Tower facility; make sure they don't turn the place into a new nest.

title: Population Control I
description: We've been monitoring creature populations, and there's been a sharp increase in Rattler numbers. Go eliminate some to keep their population in check.

title: Titans of Industry
description: Scouts have found Titan Ore deposits on Fortuna III! Go see if the rumours are true and bring us samples. And some Altered Nickel, while you're at it.

title: Crystal Frenzy
description: We're working on a new type of laser for our latest mining platforms. For the lenses, we will need Clear Veltecite and Focus Crystals. Off you go!

title: Classified II
description: Ah, Prospector. We need Clear Veltecite and Derelict Explosives for an experiment. I cannot say any more and expect utmost discretion.

title: Living Black Box
description: Marauders have been lingering around the Bright Sands Crashed Ship site; get rid of them so I can send someone to find out why.

title: Sanitation
description: I'm sending a team down to check soil samples around the Crashed Ship; I need you to clear the area of vermin before they arrive.

title: Behavioral Analysis III
description: Time for more behavioral combat data, Prospector. Get yourself a Sniper Rifle and test it out by hunting any creatures on Fortuna.

title: Crashed Ship
description: According to Intel, a ship with valuable Osiris tech crashed in the Jungle. Go clear the area of Rattlers so our troops can loot the wreck!

title: Prove your skills
description: Time for you to show what you're capable of! Kill creatures using a pistol to prove your skills.

title: Behavioral Analysis V
description: Time for another test: find out how thick a live Crusher's hide really is using an Assault Rifle or Sniper Rifle.

title: Restoring the Balance
description: Some believe Osiris and Korolev weapons outclass ours. Use ICA weapons to "educate" rival Prospectors as to who really makes the best guns.

title: Internal Combustion
description: The IFA filed a report that the Basilisk is "an unnecessarily cruel weapon"; take out some Prospectors with one and prove its efficacy outweighs all drawbacks.

title: Hallowed Ground
description: Prospectors have been vandalizing what's left of the Bright Sands Base Camp; go down there and teach them some manners.

title: Safety Measures
description: Wonderful. The Meteor Core we acquired is powering our Drone Fleet nicely. But we need Gyroscopes and Autoloaders to stabilize the Reactor.

title: Pinnacle of Evolution
description: The Pinnacle Labs have been overrun by creatures. There is highly sensitive and valuable research equipment in there, Prospector, so get to work.

title: Unlimited Power?
description: Fine. I guess you need to know. We are trying to charge Veltecite with power, the same way the Storm does. Bring us more Veltecite Samples.

title: Tour Guide
description: Fortuna III's seen a spike in "fake" Prospectors, here just to take in the scenery. Go down there and set the tone: take some out with an Assault Rifle.

title: Brains over brawn
description: Some of the lab techs here hold the belief Crushers are Fortuna III's apex predator. Prove them wrong.

title: Clear the Swamp
description: Those Blast Ticks are a real nuisance. Go eliminate some, and while you're there, bring back some Brightcaps.

title: Muddied Waters
description: Creatures roaming the Lake around our Lab have been obstructing research retrieval efforts. Take them out.

title: Meteor Core
description: Prospector! Osiris seems to have gotten their hands on a Meteor Core from the main Meteor of a Meteor Shower. We need one as well!

title: Excavation Gear
description: For excavations, we need you to stash a Heavy Mining Tool in one of Badums Dead Drop Containers underground at East Collection Point. You'll find it.

title: Egg Delivery III
description: We are close to being able to grow Blue Runners in our lab, Prospector, we just require more Blue Runner Eggs. You know what to do.

title: Bad Acid
description: Of course it would be that Acid Ticks feed on Glowy Brightcaps. Prospector, get me more samples, and kill some of those pests for good measure!

title: Data Drive II
description: The Data you brought us was helpful, but we need more precise Meteorological Values. Load a Data Drive with Rare Data and deliver it to us.

title: Data Drive IV
description: In order to be able to predict Storm Behaviour more precisely, we will need higher quality Data. Bring us a Valuable Data Drive.

title: Stashing Safety
description: One of our Miners has been injured and is hiding near Base Camp. Go stash a Rare Shield for them there and clear the area of creatures.

title: Proprietary Technology
description: Those insufferable Osiris idiots are messing with our Uplinks. It's time to send a message. Eliminate a rival Prospector using an ICA Weapon, let them know it was us.

title: Lab Rats
description: An opportunity has presented itself that requires some "special" testing. Head to the Waterfall and Vaccine Labs and prepare some "volunteers" for us to pick up.

title: Burying the Lead
description: KBR Longshot sales need a boost back home; let's show them what a Korolev rifle can do to Marauders and Prospectors!

title: Sales Pitch
description: Habitat Civil Protection doesn't believe our guns are worth the price; take out some rival Prospectors with a Korolev Pistol and Shotgun to shut them up!

title: Battery Day
description: Prospector, we have developed a new type of Battery based on Meteor Cores that will fuel a drop ship or excavator for years. You know what to do!

title: Data Drop
description: Prospector. One of our Scientists is convinced she can predict the Storm, but she needs Data. Stash Rare Data Drives at Fulfilment Center for her.

title: Energy Crisis III
description: Our Security Systems ran out of power and are runnning on emergency backup. This is not sustainable. We need more Miniature Reactors.

title: Unstable Sample
description: Turns out these Meteor Shards that Korolev has been using to fuel their damn drills are fragments of Fortuna's Moon. We obviously need samples!

title: Energy Crisis II
description: We need more power for our Community Life Support Systems, Prospector! Go get us more Miniature Reactors.

title: Promising Results
description: Prospector, both Meteor Shards and Meteor Cores proved invaluable in our Xenological Research. Bring us more of both, and be discrete about it.

title: Stability is Key
description: Our Comms are jammed. We need you to stash a Magnetic Field Stabilizer at each of the three Base Camp Dead Drops, Main Office, Gate A and Gate C.

title: Data Drive V
description: Yes! The more precise Data you brought us was a great success! Do you think you are ready to bring us a Unique Data Drive?

title: Dustbloom
description: A scout came back rambling about gorgeous vibrant flowers growing in dry and open plains on Fortuna. Go see if you can find some, and bring them back.

title: Loadout Drop
description: One of our more... lethal assets on Fortuna requires some gear for her next job. Go stash some in the Pinnacle Labs Dead Drop for her.

title: Jamming the Comms
description: Prospector. Acquire some Derelict Explosives and go stash them in the specified Dead Drop at Comms Tower. Be discrete about it, and no questions.

title: Provide an Advocate
description: Our field agent requested better gear to take down some creatures hindering his mission. Stash an Advocate Rifle at the Starport Cafeteria for him.

title: Upgrades
description: We want to take over an ICA Data Center. Stash a Master Unit CPU at the Server Room so that our Tech Staff can use it to splice the System.

title: Data Drive III
description: Good work last time, Prospector. The Data was perfect. This time, bring us two Rare Data Drives.

title: Core Values
description: Ah, there you are, Prospector. We need you to drop down there and get us the Meteor Core of a Meteor Shower for some experiments. Off you go.

title: Spare Parts
description: One of the Servers at Starport has been failing. Before we can send down a Technician, stash new Zero Systems CPUs for them in the Server Room.

title: Toxin Testing
description: This mission requires maximum discretion, Prospector. Stash Toxic Glands at the Waterfall Lab for an experiment that is none of your business.

title: Shady Deal
description: We'll have to do business with a rather shady arms dealer to supply our troops. They want us to stash Old Currency near Nutrion Farms as payment. Go.

title: Exclusive Drilling Rights
description: Alright Prospector; gear up and go get us some more Letium. We will of course pay extra for the risks, as well as you absolute secrecy...

title: Stormy Samples II
description: Head down to Pinnacle Labs, look for the Dead Drop there and stash Glowy Brightcap Mushrooms in it. Our Field Scientists will pick them up later.

title: Field Repairs
description: Ah, there you are. Search for the Dead Drop Container at the Swamp Skeleton and stash some Ball Bearings in there. Our miners need them for field repairs.

title: No Expiry Date
description: There you are, finally! There's been an accident at one of our factories and we urgently require Old Medicine from the surface, hurry!

title: Stocking Up
description: We need Brittle Titan Ore, Prospector. And lots of it! I trust you know where to look for it by now? As they say, this is not your first rodeo.

title: Gluttony
description: What?! Osiris has been harvesting OUR Waterweed for their Research? Go get us more Waterweed Filaments and eliminate a Prospector, as a warning!

title: Field Supplies
description: We need to make more construction materials available to building sites on Crescent Falls. Go stash Polymetallic Prefabricate near Greens Prospect.

title: Storm Interference
description: Prospector, the Storm has been distorting all signals from our Comms Tower. We need you to head down there and stash Magnetic Field Stabilizers there.

title: Lense Repairs
description: It's time to replace the lenses of the Satellite Dish at Comms Tower. Look for the Dead Drop there and stash Optic Glass in it.

title: Mouths to feed
description: We have to ask you once more to deliver some Waterweed Filaments to us. And more this time, to make sure we can feed the community a bit longer.

title: Emergency Power
description: Prospector. Got a mission for you. Go stash a Miniature Reactor in the Storage Room Dead Drop at Nutrion Farms, as emergency power supply.

title: Shock and Awe
description: Prospector, get us some Shock Absorbers from the surface, our equipment here needs maintenance. Get us the parts, if they're Korolev they'll still work for sure! Well... probably.

title: Grenadier
description: Prospector. You have heard of Badum's Dead Drop Containers, right? We need you to find the one at Swamp Skeleton and stash Grenades in it for our Troops.

title: Ammo Supplies
description: Our Field Agents need more Ammo if they are to protect our Research Installations. Go stash Medium Ammo at Stockpile near Greens Prospect for them.

title: Indigenous Fruit
description: Ah, Prospector, have you come across any Indigenous Fruit on the surface? They seem to be a remarkably high source of potassium, they could make for good, cheap supplements.

title: Shards of pure Power
description: These Meteor Shards are incredibly valuable. We can use them to power our mining machinery. Bring us more, Prospector.

title: Flexible Sealant
description: A number of our weather balloons took damage from recent storms, and we urgently need them back in the sky. Some Resin Guns should help patch them up.

title: Cross-Breeding
description: We want to cross-breed Pale Ivy with Waterweed, to hopefully create a plant with vast medicinal applications. Go get us the needed Mother Plants.

title: A Craving
description: Wanna make some extra cash? We would pay well for some Nutritional Bars. They taste funny, but nostalgia has deep pockets.

title: Stormy Samples
description: Ah, there you are. We need someone to go stash Charged Spinal Bases at the Fulfilment Center for our Field Scientists to pick up. Can you do it?

title: Live Fire
description: Prospector, marketing department wants more test data to sell our superior weapons; go take out rival Prospectors with Korolev Weapons!

title: Target Practice
description: We want you to test out killing Marauders from a distance, see how easy they are to track... and how fast they can close in.

title: Mining Bot
description: Our engineers have designed an autonomous mining bot. Bring us a Zero Systems CPU and some Ball Bearings for the prototype.

title: Pest Control
description: We need you to eliminate Marauders and Rattlers, Prospector! They're a threat to our scouts and scavengers.

title: Excavator Improvements
description: The suspension on our mining excavators need improvements to handle rocky terrain. We need Multitools, Ball Bearings and Hydraulic Pistons.

title: None of your Business
description: Prospector. We need Toxic Glands. Don't ask questions, just go acquire some and bring them back with maximum discretion.

title: Energy Crisis
description: Gear up and go get us some Meteor Fragments and Clear Veltecite! If the rumors are true, this stuff could power our station systems for weeks!

title: New Mining Tools
description: We are producing new Mining Tools for new Prospectors and need Hydraulic Pistons and Hardened Metals for it. You know what to do.

title: Geologist
description: You got time for a job, Prospector? The samples you brought us weren't pure enough. Get us Pure Veltecite and some Pure Focus Crystals this time.

title: Lab equipment
description: Improvements to our lab equipment are long overdue. Go get us Optic Glass for better microscopes!"

title: Arms Race
description: Prospector. It seems like Korolev is working on some sort of new laser rifle that uses Pure Focus Crystals. Go get us some, and be discrete about it.

title: Automated Security
description: We will have to build new turrets to help protect our mining sites and landing pads. Bring us Zero Systems CPUs and Hardened Metals.

title: Parasites
description: We need your help, Prospector. Our Warehouse at Nutrion Farms got overrun by creatures. Get there before they destroy our stocked rations.

title: Laser Rifles
description: We are prototyping a new laser rifle that can penetrate even Crusher skulls. Get us Focus Crystals and Pure Focus Crystals for the lenses.

title: Water Filtration System
description: We need to do some repairs to our water filtration system. Bring us Polymetallic Prefabricate and Compound Sheets.

title: Xeno-Archaeology II
description: Prospector! The Archaeology Team we sent to Skeleton Observation was attacked by Marauders. These beasts have to die so we can continue our research!

title: Protect our Claim
description: Greedy Prospectors have been filling their own pockets with valuable minerals from our Dig Site. Go eliminate any Prospector there, send a message!

title: Protect our Investments
description: Prospector. Rattlers and Marauders are a major threat to our fragile sensors on Fortuna III. Go take care of some of these creatures.

title: New Beds
description: The ICA community housing project has been expanding fast, and we need Azure Tree Bark and Alloys to build some new beds.

title: New 3D Printer
description: Prospector! To help us provide our troops with the gear and supplies they require, we need Shard Slicers and Autoloaders for a new 3D printer.

title: Insufficient Processing Power
description: Prospector! The Zero Systems CPU you brought us for the mining bot was not powerful enough. We'll need a Master Unit CPU instead.

title: Forest Clearing
description: I need someone to head down to the Bright Sands Jungle and make sure other Prospectors and the local wildlife learn to stay out of it. No, you don't need to know why.

title: Retaliation
description: One of our scavenging parties was taken out by Prospectors. That offense can't go unpunished: eliminate some Prospectors to send a message.

title: Leaving a Mark
description: Some are saying Korolev is afraid of conflict! Get that idea out of their heads! Take out rival Prospectors, let them know Korolev sent you!

title: Botanist III
description: Our studies on Brightcaps continue. I need you to find a new specimen type, you'll be able to tell them apart by their glow. Now hurry!

title: Calorie Deficit
description: Prospector, we are running low on food and need your help. Go get us some Waterweed Filaments for our Nutrient Farms. And hurry please.

title: On Our Team
description: A big arms merchant is on station looking to buy; head down and take out Striders, Rattlers, and Prospectors with the Advocate to help secure us a sale.

title: Data Drive VI
description: We're finding more than just Storm data now... Get us more Unique Data Drives, Prospector, what we might find could have immeasurable value!

title: Prim & Proper
description: A delegation from off system just arrived, and our people need to look their best to woo them for patronage. Get us some Jewellery from the surface, hopefully we can impress.

title: Meteor Shards
description: We have received reports of incredibly powerful Meteor Shards unpredictably dropping onto Fortuna in spectacular Meteor Showers. Go get us some!

title: A Solution?
description: Prospector. We have gotten our hands on a load of powerful Energy Rifles Korolev has been working on. We need Miniature Reactors to charge them.

title: Technical Supplies
description: The field technician in charge of our on-planet biosurveillance systems requires new Interactive Screens. Go stash some at Main Office.

title: Sabotage
description: Prospector! Those Korolev simpletons are drilling near one of our Uplinks. Bring us Zero Systems CPUs and Derelict Explosives. You know why.

title: Harvest Day
description: A lab contamination has cost us dozens of samples! You need to get down there and get more Brightcaps, glowing ones too. Now!

title: And two smoking Barrels
description: Prospector. Get down there and stash a PKR Maelstrom Shotgun and some Ammo at the Comms Tower for one of our Field Agents. And be discrete about it.

title: Pale Ivy
description: We have received reports of strange Ivy-like plants growing on walls and cliffs, bearing rare beautiful blossoms. Needless to say, we need samples.

title: Superior Firepower
description: We need to prove to these ICA troglodytes that Osiris weaponry is more than lethal. Use it to eliminate another Prospector.

title: Striking Big
description: Damn it! We ran out of Fuel for our Radiation Shields here on the Station. And there's no replacement for Nanite Infused Crude Oil. You know what to do.

title: Don't get crushed
description: Gear up, Prospector! We need Crusher Skins for our Material Sciences Department. The tissue is said to be resistant to radiation, we must test that theory.

title: Let it grow
description: Aha, there's our new rising star! Prospector, see if you can find us some Magic-GROW Fertilizer, it'll help with our nutrient farms on the station.
